channel.title: Sales on Welcome to dave.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Sales on Welcome to dave.dev

item.title: Simplify Simplify Simplify In Sales
item.description: It’s super important to understand and know your audience. Even when you think you’re not being technical, there are levels of un-technical you can drop to that make you cringe, but if your audience needs it, then it’s a great skill to learn.
